temporal_isolation.description: Only information available at prediction time is used
temporal_isolation.implementation: Strict temporal ordering of all data points
temporal_isolation.validation: Walk-forward analysis with progressive training windows

information_embargo.description: Respect realistic filing processing and availability delays
information_embargo.market_hours_constraint: Predictions only actionable during trading hours

walk_forward_validation.description: Progressive training and testing to simulate real-time deployment

bias_detection_tests.performance_stability: Test for consistent performance over time

trading_realism.after_hours_filings: Available next trading day at market open
trading_realism.immediate_trading_check: Verify if prediction can be acted upon immediately
